hero.subtitle: 8+ years crafting scalable web & mobile experiences
hero.description: Ex-Microsoft contractor reaching 1B+ users • React, TypeScript & React Native specialist

about.title: About
about.p1: I build fast, user-loving apps and mobile experiences.

telescope.title: Frontend Team Lead Engineer
descriptions: Frontend Team Lead
Async request handling on frontend with Signal.
GPT Integration for data analysis and visualization.
Highcharts library for AI based data analysis and visualization.
Using signal for async request handling on frontend.
Develop and optimize frontend solutions, focusing on performance and user experience improvements.
Work closely with product teams to deliver innovative solutions for real-time data analytics and visualization.

microsoft.title: Frontend Engineer
descriptions: Building all community related UI components from zero for Microsoft News canvases (Edge, Windows 10 taskbar, Windows 11 widgets, msn.com etc.), including commenting, user/publisher profiles, tipping, subscription, and personalized notifications.
These experiences are now reaching across 53 markets and 1 billion monthly unique active users.
Led the development of:
Microsoft Tools AEC UI
Microsoft Views UI
Microsoft Community UI (Responsible for the development)
Microsoft Beacon UI
Microsoft Flyout UI
Conducted Visual Parity Test development and Unit Test development, ensuring consistent and reliable performance across platforms.

kod.title: Full Stack Developer & Mobile Developer
descriptions: Web, B2B, B2C
Web CRM and Mobile CRM development
Web and Mobile POS development
Web and Mobile Inventory management development
Web and Mobile Reporting development
Web and Mobile Inventory management development
Web and Mobile Inventory management development
Led the development of advanced B2C and B2B mobile applications, now widely used across hotels in Turkey.
Specialized in solving complex build and publish issues for iOS and Android platforms.

phoenix.title: Middle Software Engineer (Frontend Developer)
descriptions: Developed web applications focusing on performance optimizations and feature enhancements using modern JavaScript frameworks.

eveara.title: Middle Software Engineer (Frontend Developer)
descriptions: Worked on a variety of frontend projects, contributing to the overall code quality and product design.

medyat.title: Junior - Middle Software Engineer (Full Stack Developer)
descriptions: Gained foundational experience in full stack development, working on diverse projects from inception to deployment.

johannes.description: It was a real pleasure working with Yunus during our time at Microsoft MSN / News. He brought a friendly, steady energy to every project, even when we were dealing with fires behind the scenes. I always appreciated how patient and solution-oriented he was. You could rely on him to stay calm, cut through the noise, and get us moving again. We tackled plenty of technical challenges together, including building new experiences like tipping and subscriptions. Yunus consistently found fast, effective ways to solve complex problems at scale for millions of users across many international markets. I'm grateful for the time we worked together and would happily collaborate with him again.

riza.description: As Yunus's team leader at Microsoft, I watched him grow into an exceptional frontend developer. His eagerness to learn and ability to quickly grasp complex concepts was remarkable. He brought both technical excellence and a positive attitude to our team.

alp.description: At Microsoft, Yunus stood out as one of the most dedicated frontend developers I've worked with. His collaborative spirit elevates everyone around him. He takes ownership, communicates effectively, and brings creative solutions to every challenge.

edgar.quote: Excellent Job with Real Attention to Detail
edgar.description: I had the chance to work with Yunus during a project at Microsoft, where he handled the front-end work for an automation system interface. He did an excellent job, bringing clarity, consistency, and real attention to detail. Collaborating with him was genuinely enjoyable — he was easy to work with, always in a good mood, and contributed a lot to the project's success. I'm happy to recommend him.

mert.description: As a PM at Microsoft, I was impressed by Yunus's ability to bridge product vision and technical implementation. He understood the 'why' behind every feature and often suggested UX improvements. A rare combination of technical excellence and product thinking.

asli.description: Working alongside Yunus on the same projects at Microsoft was a great experience. His frontend skills are top-notch, and he's always willing to help and share knowledge. A reliable teammate who delivers quality work consistently.

mustafa.description: Yunus and I worked together on MSN News & Feeds editorial tools. His frontend expertise and collaborative approach made our projects run smoothly. Always professional and delivers great results.

mertuysal.description: Working with Yunus at Microsoft was a great experience. His frontend skills and problem-solving abilities are impressive. A dependable teammate who always delivers quality work.

huseyin.description: Yunus and I worked together at Microsoft on various projects. His frontend expertise and attention to detail made our collaboration smooth. A reliable colleague who brings positive energy to the team.

tugce.description: Working with Yunus at Microsoft on Msn.com was a great learning experience. He was always helpful with frontend challenges and shared his knowledge generously. A supportive colleague who makes the team better.

mustafagur.description: Yunus and I worked together at Microsoft. His frontend skills and professional approach to problem-solving were impressive. A great colleague who consistently delivers high-quality work.

tahir.description: Working with Yunus at Telescope Labs was seamless. As the Figma designer, I appreciated how perfectly he translated my designs into pixel-perfect implementations. His frontend leadership and attention to detail made our collaboration exceptional.

tarik.description: As a backend engineer at Telescope Labs, working with Yunus as frontend team lead was excellent. He understood API structures quickly and our collaboration was always smooth. A skilled leader who delivers quality work.

fatma.description: We work with the same team. Working with him on the same project is reassuring and wonderful. He is helpful, hardworking and has very strong communication. He is a teammate that everyone would want to work with. I wish him continued success. I hope everyone will have a teammate like him one day.

oguzhan.description: As Head of Software Department, Yunus impressed us with his mastery of modern frontend technologies. He transforms complex requirements into elegant, performant interfaces. His growth was remarkable.

isfendiyar.description: Our frontend-backend collaboration was seamless. He understood API requirements instantly and delivered pixel-perfect implementations. A great person to work with. Miss those days, brother!

mehmet.description: From our first conversation, I knew Yunus was special. His enthusiasm and professionalism were evident immediately. He became a key member of our team and earned everyone's respect.

murat.description: Yunus and I worked together as full stack engineers at Medya-T. His ability to handle both frontend and backend was impressive. A hardworking and talented developer.

tasar.description: As CEO of Medya-T, I had the pleasure of introducing Yunus to real-world software development. His eagerness to learn and quick adaptation to professional practices was remarkable. A promising talent from day one.

sarah.description: Professional, skilled, and always delivers on time. Exceeded all our expectations.

david.description: Rare combination of technical skills and creative vision. Pixel-perfect precision and smooth animations.

motofamily.description: A social network and events platform designed for motorcycle enthusiasts. Bringing riders together with discounts, live maps, maintenance tracking, and community features.

reactSeamlessSlider.description: A seamless infinite scrolling slider component for React with TypeScript support. Features smooth, continuous scrolling without any visible jumps or blinks. Perfect for displaying logos, testimonials, or any content that needs to scroll infinitely.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
